attributes.action: Stop companies from charging unbelieveable amounts for bottled water
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You may well have noticed how unbelieveably expensive it is to purchase a single bottle of water.

For example, most vending machines now charge on average £1 for a bottle of water.

How is it, that 5 litres of tap water cost about 1p and these companies can charge stupid amounts, becuase they know that we humans need water to survive. 

This commodity isn't highly taxed, such as petrol, which coincidently, I can buy one litre of petrol, cheaper than a bottle of water, even though it's been through an expensive refinery process!!

In short: Please stop these companies from doing this and placing a realistic RRP price on the product.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
